articles.title: U.S. immigration authorities are detaining European travelers, weighing on tourism - CBS News
articles.description: Detentions of tourists at U.S. borders are making some Europeans think twice before visiting the U.S.
articles.content:
Some Europeans are becoming leery of visiting the U.S., as reports of U.S. immigration authorities detaining them while traveling, for reasons that are not clear, swirl. 
A number of tourists from E… [+3541 chars]
